body: LEAD: About 200 civil-rights demonstrators staged a candlelight march against racism last night in the Canarsie section of Brooklyn, but their chants were drowned out by an even larger crowd of young white hecklers who moved alongside the marchers yelling ''Niggers go home!'' and ''White power!'' body: LEAD: City officials yesterday ordered strengthened security at a Brooklyn high school hit by an outbreak of racial violence as students and residents of the area told of rising tensions between blacks and whites marked by slurs, fights and the kind of territoriality associated with gangs. title: AT BRAWL SITE, TALES OF RECENT RISE IN RACIAL TENSION
